content.raw: yeah, I see your point now, that makes sense. I guess it comes down to, do we want to support gazebo < 1.4 with this package?  If we are co-releasing it with a drcsim version that is < 1.4, then we have to... but if not, if its public debut will be with gazebo 1.4, I guess we might as well just only support gazebo >= 1.4 for clarity's sake. but I can be persuaded.

If we are co-releasing it with a drcsim version that is < 1.4, then we have to... but if not, if its public debut will be with gazebo 1.4, I guess we might as well just only support gazebo >= 1.4 for clarity's sake. but I can be persuaded.
